name: The Epilogue Of Mankind
description: A game that briefly describes what the world will probably be like after. All mankind is lost, confused and trying to resolve all of what has happened. The world has punished us for what we have done to it over the past years. We've nuked ourselves, we've gone out of control, but most importantly, we don't really know who we are anymore. You are one of those dwellers and you must fight your way through many factors such as hunger, thirst, fatigue, and more.  There is radioactive factors in the environment, making us all stay below the terrain of Earth.  Only few managed to get through this rough time, and maybe unite. Are you up to the challenge to go outside for a day? (There are 7 different endings, so please enjoy!)
